document.full_text: the boston bruins beat the tampa bay lightning 1-0 in a cliffhanger game seven on friday to advance to the nhl's stanley cup final against the vancouver canucks.
document.title: bruins joins canucks in stanley cup final
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins beat the tampa bay lightning 1-0 in a cliffhanger game seven on friday to advance to the nhl's stanley cup final against the vancouver canucks.
